review_text: Great video - very clear and easy to understand.

WOW. I feel like I would've spent years (and thousands of dollars!) to learn what I did in this course. Jon has a gift for teaching in a way that's insightful, concise and entertaining. A must-buy for any content creator.

This course provides very practical tips about creating killer content through telling great stories. I've already put it in to practice and see engagement with my audience increasing. By just adding #ServiceStory to my daily routine, I am getting more results. Highly recommend!

When I decided to purchase this course. I was hoping to learn fresh ideas; not the boring or stale fluff stuff. Oh, boy! I was in for a treat. Jon Youshaei presentation was fabulously engaging, funny and entertaining. Jon shared a wealth of information; that I cannot wait to add to my routine. This course has sparked my creativity in a way... That will make new content shine bright like a diamond. Do I endorse this course? Of course! I give it the Nika approval stamp. Cheers! =)
Jon is an excellent presenter, and I learned quite a few new things that can help me write better articles, blog posts and maybe product descriptions. I look forward to implementing his techniques.
I enjoyed the course. It's worth every penny!
Great course.
Excellent course. Was extremely helpful.
The course was eye opening and exciting.  I wasn't the best storyteller but with this course I feel that I can become more confident and open to challenging myself.
This is an awesome course. I am blown away by the tips and tricks shared by the mentor.

The best lesson was the 7th one, where he talked about how to get published on bigger publications. Although the rest of the advice was really helpful, the simple way in which he made me realise that I could start interacting with contributors around the world by looking their email up on websites is why I love these courses. It mights seem like nothing, but you need to realise before anyone else if you want to stay ahead of your competition and that's what this course gave me. Awesome, will come back for more.

I like the way he presented the course. But, most of the information is easily available online for free. 

None the less it's great to have curated tips and tricks in one bundle which you can easily refer to whenever you want. 

Honestly, I was hoping for more but definitely not bad for the price.

“There are so many stories in the world just waiting to be told.” This course empowers you to tell any story and actually make people listen. Kudos to Jon Youshaei and his storytelling wisdom. Thank you for creating this course.
Learnt a lot from this but was specifically blown away by the 'closing thoughts' !
Excellent course. One of the best I've taken in my 62-years!
Superb! Really great course.

I enjoyed the course. The information wasn't as life altering as his other course on Viral Marketing. I really enjoyed that one. 

But overall, great course if you know nothing about creating content online.
I really enjoyed this course. Definitely gave me some inspirational thoughts to use towards my business.
The lectures were quite educative and instructive. I would rate it 5 stars.
Very valuable content!

After treading water with my writing for years (while I was teaching), I decided to become more serious and see if I could earn some decent money from it. With that in mind, I am absolutely stoked that I decided to take this course. Not only did I learn more about what I thought I knew but I also learnt a lot about what I didn't know, if you know what I mean. A great course and amazingly under-priced! :-)
Yes, you probably can get all the information for free through eBooks, blog posts and experience. But you can't get it in such a memorable fashion. You'll never forget the stories Jon tells.

I had been a creative writer to local newspapers+ a poetry book and lost my inspiration with my father's death 10 years ago... 

Have been wanting to start again.... This really Inspired me and showed me how to start again... something I loved doing apart from graphics....

Loved the course & Thank you so much....

Great Content, Great Course, Great Delivery, Thanks for the tips, apps and  the lesson. I rated 4 stars instead of 5 just because, I'm a beginner in content marketing, I expected to see a guideline to follow when writing on a topic especially topics you know nothing about; the research process, mapping out your outlines etc. Overall great course.
It was fun and enlightening! Highly recommended.

This was my Friday night "movie" and I did all 7 lessons and the bonus in one setting. So much good information. Each lesson is broken down into easy and understandable sections with great examples on how, why, and when to do things throughout the writing process. The lessons are not long and drawn out, but concise and to the point. I highly recommend this course for anyone who wants to be a better writer and learn new writing skills and practical techniques.

Jon was a great presenter. His course was well-structured and planned out--just like he teaches. Most people would think that this course is all wrong for me as a voice-over artist, but the truth is, I see myself as a storyteller, even if it's with someone else's words. If I can interact with my buyers as Jon taught, I can tell their story better, and we all grow together.
A gem of a course that helps honing that inner gem in you to be a more successful writer.
Useful information that will surely improve my customers results!
I found it extremely useful. Packed with practical advice. Thank you for sharing those secrets.
Great Course!
Great course. The material was very useful.

I was skeptical at first because I thought this may be just a blog article laid out as a course for $30 but it was one of the best courses I've attended so far and I've attended many. Definitely worth the money.
Loved it - great presentation with engaging content and well paced chapters. Most important of all? I've put the advice into practice straight away.
Great layout and rhythm! I didn't find myself losing interest at any point :)
Amazing!
This course was practical, engaging, and completely worth my time. Thanks for helping me brush up on important writing skills.
Great course and valuable content!
Solid strategies. Good analogies, short, concise course.
Great course. Thanks for the help.
Amazing content, I learned so much. This is going to make me a much better freelancer and professional. Thank you!

Jon did an amazing job of delivering exactly what he promised in clear, valuable, and memorable ways. I was able to take notes, and think of practical applications for what I learned, as I enjoyed his presentation. I recommend this course without hesitation; great value for the price!
The tips were not really anything that a writer doesn't already know. However, it was a good refresher and the instructor had fun, easy ways of getting his points across.
Great course. Lots of good tips.
Outstanding! Great content, really liked it!
A pleasure to watch from the beginning to the end.
An excellent course that teaches how to write an excellent story about anything.
Was expecting more content for the price paid.

Jon presents familiar ideas in a pithy, entertaining and progressive way. I can now better organize and structure my ideas and inspiration so that I work with more clarity and waste less time. The content of the course was rich but not excessive, and well-organized so it was easy to focus on what was key for me at this stage in my writing career.

This guy is amazing! The content is very easy to digest and of the best quality. The way that he has structured everything is utterly amazing. I am baffled how you managed to deliver so much information in such a short amount of time. 
10/10!

You won't find more actionable information in one place on this subject than you can find here. I already knew some of the concepts but sometimes it helps to have someone tell you how to skip to the front of the line... especially someone who's proven that it works. Jon delivers.
Amazing. Jon delivered the lessons as though he's right here with me.

As someone who just began his freelance writing, this is truly a guide I wish I had sooner. Very easy to get through the course and amazing tips. It's so good I've gone through the course twice. I HIGHLY recommend it if you're serious on becoming an amazing writer!
This content was very engaging and informative content. It was presented in small easy to digest bites with specific examples. Well done!
Great material, easy to digest and valuable advice! It feels so good to have learned so many things from one of the best! Please keep it coming, for those of us seeking to reach the next level.
Great course with many helpful, easy to follow tips and examples.
jon youshaei does a great job teaching that it's so easy to understand and learn plus you get more then you pay for.

An insightful and flowing course that has certainly opened my eyes. I recommend this course to anyone who writes content. The carefully structured approach detailed in the course is exactly what I needed to refocus my personal writing plan. The truth is, I didn't have much of a plan. Now I do. If you take this course, I am sure you will have too. A great investment, one I am glad I made.
Concise and impactful....changed the way I write ads and content!
Lots of great information
He is the bomb. I’m thrilled that I am taking another course with him right now!
Great Course! Thanks a lot
Great info and simple told. Easy to understand.
It was really nice and useful! Recommended!
Great content, great examples and great actionable tips. Worth every dollar.
Easy, actionable suggestions. Putting labels on a lot of the stuff many writers do intuitively. Clear and easy to follow direction.
Outstanding. Worth every cent. Bless!
Great, practical insights and advice. Highly recommend.
Provides really useful content in an easy to understand relaxing way.
Loved the course! Clear information, actionable tips. Can't wait to try them out! Thank you!
Awesome course. Really insightful!
Really strong ideas, distilled into easy-to-do steps. Grateful for the course!
Great source of information, inspiration and strategy relating to using modern methods of sharing ideas via the internet.  Great Job Jon look forward to doing more work with you in the near future.

Out standing! Learn lot he explained very well easy to understand.
Thanks.
Great content. Can't wait to apply these tips to build our business!

Changed my entire mindset on writing. 

Not only did it inspire me to set higher goals for myself, but it also helped me get past some of the limiting beliefs and obstacles that were holding me back. 

I can't wait to put these principles to work. 

Thanks for your time creating this and sharing all of this valuable information!
Amazing, straight to the point with lots of metaphors, easy to understand and very valuable!
Interesting, helpful and a bunch of great tips. The only thing I would have liked is a PDF with all the main tips from each lesson.
GREAT!!! course, highly recommend it.
Another great course from Jon. The way he explains things is just simply amazing. I totally recommend this course to anyone who wants to improve the writing skill.

Great course! Some new things and tips, some things you maybe already know or do intuitively anyway probably but which are always good to see or hear "put together" and remember. I took quite a few notes about things I want to pay more attention to in future.

A lot of really good starter material. There a few hiccups in spelling and pronunciation, but the presenter quite obviously knows what he's talking about and acts as an excellent teacher. You can't get caught up in the little details, just open yourself up and learn from a master.

Amazing and invaluable content and tips! Jon does a great job engaging you throughout each and every lesson and his tips are extremely actionable! I'm excited to make use of them and become a better storyteller! Thank you, Jon!
Very Useful.
Simply fabulous! Very practical, realistic, and useful information. Great "insider tips". Worth the price of the course!
Some of the material I already knew. It was a great refresher and the bonus was useful. Worth it.
Great content, great delivery and absolutely engaging.

Becoming a 7th grader again!
I like the course, came to know about it after connecting with Jon on LinkedIn

The concept is clear! , the easiest way to state is " the more educated you are, the more we complicate Simple Stuff"

Just writing the stories which connect, which takes us on a visual journey & which we are familiar with is the key in writing!
I am glad we got connected & I went for my first course on fiverr with yours
Great content, simple indeed.
This course is very informative and very valuable since the author shares his own way of working. Learned a lot from this course. Thank you! :)
Brilliant course. I'm a journalist myself and this refresher was a godsend.
Really nice guy :) I learned a few valuable things from this course.

Excellent information for anyone who wants to write impactful and lastingly relevant content. I loved the tool suggestions he gave to help with analysis of reading level and headlines as well as the real world advice on how to get your writing published in larger publications. This one tip was worth the whole course for me as this is one of my big goals for this year.
Great course!
Distilled practical wisdom - simply awesome!
Interesting.
Brilliant course and was well presented! Thank you very much.
Very well put together. This course is a gold mine for beginners and a great add-on for more experienced writers.
Great content and presentation!
Loved the content, was left starving for more.

I've spent so much money to try to find this exact information in this course. This is exactly what I needed to help me to put together great content for my blog and for anything else I choose to write in the future. Thank you so much!
I was blown away by the precise way Jon presented the concepts. He is extremely clear and very effective in the way he delivers the core concepts of writing a great story. Loved the course.
Loved it. I actually learned some valuable tips which I will be able to apply immediately. Great conversational teaching style, and very accessible throughout.
The author presented several eye-opening points. My buyers on Fiverr are now getting highly readable content.
Really impressed by the course content. Learned a lot of things.
Jon did an excellent job. This course is full of surprises for those who really want to excel in content writing or marketing.
Bright and wonderful ideas, just like a box of hidden treasures waiting to be discovered... smiles!
Jon laid out a path of clear, actionable steps to follow that I have not seen anywhere else... This course is a game changer. Thank you to Fivver and Jon!
The course is short, but memorable. I look forward to trying out every tip. I'm pretty sure the advice is excellent.

There were some pieces of advice that didn't apply to the type of content I write. For instance, if we're not writing about a "product" per se. Otherwise, it was immensely helpful. 

The biggest issue is not having the ability to refer back to the content in any way other than watching the videos. it would be nice to have summaries

Great course filled with useful tips. While taking the course, I made updates to website copy using the Hemingway app. I also created a few blog titles and headlines with the help of the headline tool. I look forward to applying more of these tips to my writing.
Loved the brief clips packed with tools and examples.  Loved John's energy and enthusiasm.

Amazing! The content was made into a bunch of tiny bite-sized pieces so I could do one quiz a day.

He was easy to understand and I am very excited to practice his advice in my blogs.
Great tips and advice to becoming a successful content writer and marketer - amazing value for money and a worthy investment.
Excellent

Very good course, one that can be used as a tool. You can always go back for pointers!  A couple of handouts would have been nice; I found myself taking a lot of screenshots so that I would have to keep going back to the tape.

Good Course, great tips!
Excellent course
WONDERFUL

Great content ! Full of information with short videos but straight to the point!
Highly recommended!
I liked the entire course, wish there were more examples and illustrations.
Great course, for me being a new in the game of content creation and story telling I got a great deal
It's an excellent course. I have learned incredible and practical tips that will help me improve my writing process.
A great fluff-free course. By the time I finished the second course, I felt confident that I made a great investment. I saw some flaws in my current strategies and immediately knew how to fix them.
Great experience!

"Stories That Sell: 7 Secrets To Create Killer Content" blew me away. The secrets included in this course were really detailed, and provided great insight. I really appreciate how Jon paints vivid pictures for us with his own writing and shares examples of how each secret can be translated into killer content. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to elevate their content.
Amazing experience I was hooked and completed in one sitting!
Good course with very helpful information about writing to grab a reader's attention and drive them to take action.
Absolutely Awesome Content!!!! Thank You!
I loved the candid, honest and actionable advice in this course. Any serious content writer owes it to themselves to take the course

A course that turns whimpering into “Wow!!”ing.
If you want to kickstart your writing gig, polish your writing skills, or understand why you wiki-walk(ish),  this is the place to start.
Really great course, simple and precise information, also the guy teaching was really comfortable to listen to and a great story teller. (can't remember his name)
Great course. We need a transcript.

As a copywriter, I knew and had implemented many of the concepts shared. Nevertheless, this course was concise and packaged knowledge learned from dozens of books in just 7 lessons. I do recommend it for both amateur and experienced writers!

I wish there were downloadable materials. I ended up pausing and taking screenshots of various images along the way. Downloadable materials would have been very nice. In fact, many $10.99 udemy courses include them, and I was surprised this one didn't.

This is a good course, and if half stars were allowed I'd give it a 4.5 overall.
One word: essential.
Very good information. Parts were a bit long.
Great info. I learned a lot.

I had to pause a lot of time to take notes etc....This consumes a lot of time.
It is great to have downloadable notes attached to the videos.
This guy is a master! You will thank yourself for buying this course and then thank him for teaching you the many hacks to create killer content. Thanks Jon!
Take this and his other course over a weekend. Jon's videos are simple yet entertaining and educational.
The bonus tips on freelancing alone are worth the price of this course. Tons of actionable tips and strategies that can be applied across multiple industries.

This course is excellent for someone who’s totally newbie in writing like me. I was able to get key lessons and I feel confident enough to use these tips in my own work.
I would recommend it to anyone who is trying to write better to perform better!
Thank you !
Really impressed with this guy. Great course. Thank you.

Loved it. Couldn’t get enough of it. 

I’m so inspired to write and get my content out there. 

I have a framework and learned plenty new skills to make my writing pop. I even learned how to pitch major publications
Talk about no fluff! Every tip was gold. I CAN now make killer content.

Super useful for someone wanting to break into the freelance writing world! I needed more help with the copywriting aspects of writing and this course broke everything down into easy to learn, but powerful concepts.
Great content for both novices and professionals

Better than any lesson I received in school! 
This course has added much more to my writing ability. 5 stars.
A really useful and motivating course!
Very helpful and memorable tips!
There was a lot of great material and advice in this lesson. More suited to beginning writers, however.
Great course from one of the best in marketing.
Best Instructor On Here! Great Course, Packed with Real Content!
Great course with actionable insights
I liked it
The course added value in streamlining the research and development process. It took efficient outlining techniques so you can think strategically even before putting pen to paper.

Fantastic content. Entirely relevant and immediately applicable. Only suggestion is to do handouts or a slide with a summary of the learning points for each section. I had to stop and rewind multiple times as some of the points rolled into the next. Sample articles to review with your checklist would've been extremely helpful, too. Still, was a Very worthwhile course and a high value for the price.
Great course! I recommend for all writers who want to take their writing skill to the next level.
So helpful!
Coool
I love how informative it is!

I admit I made excuses for months on why I shouldn't take this course. I felt it was too expensive for how short the total class was. I told myself "I'm on Fiverr to make money not spend it". I'm not sure what made me finally cough over the $45, but I can tell you, in the 7 years I've been writing, I've never had someone magically help me understand the secret of writing killer content. If you don't take this course, that's okay. Because I did, and now I've updated all my Fiverr gigs to reflect what I learned, and I plan on selling more gigs than I ever have before. Thanks!
This is one of my favorite courses to date. I highly recommend this course for all writers.
Killer content is what you'll get.  I have so much to apply here.  I'm glad I can go back and review what I've learned as I apply the steps.
The course is amazing. I must say that most of the lessons discussed are an eye-opener to me.  And thanks for the bonus video directed towards freelance writers.
Awesome course and very easy to apply to any subject.
Loved It! Learned valuable skills for becoming a good copywritter!

Daunting to see the level of care and forethought that goes into providing exceptional service but this course is a perfect introduction to setting the benchmark. I'm excited to take the lessons I've learned here and begin experimenting with them in practice. Have definitely been guilty in the past of using fancy words to show intelligence when it's clear that simplicity is the key to creating engaging content.
Great tips! I knew a few of them already, but the way he has described secrets to writing killer content is concise and worth. Great to get real-time results. Thank you!
Excellent. No fluff. Useful tips. Great for business owners too , not just writers.
A great multimedia course covering a diverse range of subjects accessibly, led by an engaging, honest, and experienced tutor.
Fantastic content that was delivered in an engaging manner
A well fleshed course & worth every dime.
Excellent content from a proven pro.
This "killer" course does not disappoint. my only wish was that there was a pdf with cliff notes or something. over all I loved it and im looking forward to his next course

Best investment I've made on a course. Completely changed my perspective on writing. As a storyboard creator and script writer for explainer videos, I've already started implementing frameworks that I learnt from this course.
Excellent Course. I have completed content after taken this course to market on amazon. Thanks for the missing links to helping me create my content!

After a decade of being a professional writer I was feeling uninspired and stuck. I was hesitant about purchasing this course, but I'm glad I did. It offered new insights, provided valuable advice, and was realistic about the process. Thank you!

This course was by far the most amazing course - This course helped me understand why some of my stories were well received, while others were just OK. Now I will re-write those stories to make each one of them significant apples in the orchard.
Great information, Excellent course to start off.
To me, the lesson is like baking toast. I was hungry for any skill to make my breakfast, and A cook go by and drop a recipe, mumm, I am making my toast now.
Simply amazing, love you Joe!
Effective course

This course is easily worth the money and the time spent to watch it! It wastes no time in getting to the point and teaches the concepts clearly, concisely, and with relevant examples. I was skeptical about buying this because there's so many (more expensive) content writing courses out there (not on Fiverr), but this one is definitely worth the reasonable price point.

So many great takeaways with this course. I have written for Forbes and other online publications and have been freelancing online for quite a while and learned so much. Taught in a straightforward and simple way. Great stuff

GREAT WISDOM WITH EXPERIENCE. 
EVERYTHING WITH PRACTICAL KNOWLEDGE.
NEED MORE COURSE LIKE THIS IN FUTURE.
Wonderful course! Above predicted expectations!
Well done!
Wow! I was really impressed by Youshaei's course!  He explained effective writing processes in a very simple and entertaining way!  I highly recommend this course!
Well worth the investment of time and money.

Really excellent insights. This course is jam packed full of golden information, presented in an easy to digest way. Applying these steps to your business is a sure way to bring much greater success.

Thank you!
Great content.  Easy to digest and not too lengthy. Thanks!
Informative and inspiring. There is so much value in the take-aways!

The streets were lined with snow. It was freezing, and I'd stepped in a deep puddle on the way to class. I had to walk around like that all day. I remember it like it was yesterday. I step into the lobby of the New York Film Academy, where I'm to spend the next four weeks, seven days a week, earning my certificate in Digital Filmmaking. Do I care that it's cold? No. Do I even care that my foot is wet? No. I'm in NYC learning how to make movies! A dream come true. Writing is a huge part of the course and I learned a boatload. My time studying in NYC illustrates only one of my many experiences with studying writing. Suffice to say, I KNOW A LOT about what makes a good story and how to tell the good teachers from the not so good ones! Jon's course is FANTASTIC and he's a FABULOUS teacher! Thank you, Jon!!! Can't wait to start your other course! Carrie :)
loved it
This course will be very useful.
It was awesome! I'll go over the lessons again and again! THANK YOU!
You can go from beginner to PRO in the writing world in under a day!

Awesome. I cannot wait to put it to use. My brain is already going in different directions wondering which of the strategies should I execute first. The course was a big eye opener even for me that I am a seasoned brand strategist.

It seemed like a lot of fluff. There were a few nuggets of great info in the course, but most of it was baseline information. Videos for each section could have been 1/3 of the length and still gotten the same point across. The instructor was awkward and constantly had stuff in, around, or coming out of his mouth...very gross.
Great content, so much value, thank you so much for the valuable lessons :)
Very informative!
Great course, easy to follow with terrific information.
Even for me as a copywriter, there were still some unknown and easy to use concepts which can be apllied directly on the day to day work. Thanks
I loved it. Not only did I learn a whole lot, but this course made me fall in love with content writing all over again. Amazing job
I loved it. Not only did I learn a whole lot, but this course made me fall in love with content writing all over again. Amazing job

Wow! Mind blowing stuff. This course feel like I could have figured it out myself. I was engaged from start to finish, and now, I feel like I am capable of delivering killer contents on command. I feel activated!
it was awesome! really learned a lot and would definitely use the tips and techniques in my work!
Very good Addition to the Viral Marketing Course!

I loved it so much. The content is smart, sexy, funny and super informative. The pace is great. I learned a great deal. The tips got me so excited that I began implementing some right away. Thank you so much!

GREAT course. Excellent strategies. Couple of thoughts:
1. Strategy #7 is a little weak. The advice is great, but it lacks depth about how the system of contributing ideas actually works. Give more mechanics. And how does that really translate to writing for publications directly? Right now, it doesn't feel like it belongs in this course without that granularity. 
2. Of the two examples provided on how to write a compelling story, one is a video and this is a course on writing. While I understand that videos require writers, my guess is most people taking this course are like me and are not ready or connected enough to write scripts for videos. A better and more germane example would have been to write about a lead generation email for a client and aligned landing page, or a blog post, or web copy of some sort. 

Just my two cents. Otherwise a great course and I did learn quite a bit. Thank you.

Superb. Jon is a great presenter and the learning material is well-conceived and delivered. This is my favourite Fiverr Learn course so far!
- Jules (Eleven Ears)
Very interesting tips and takeaways.
Highly recommended! A great course with many examples and many insights from someone with a lot of experience. Suitable for beginners.
This course is really helpful for all the content creators. Thanks for providing such a helpful information.
Great course. He did a wonderful job of explaining everything and delivered fantastic tips to improve our writing. I highly recommend this course.
Wow! I thought I knew how to write stories. I didn't. Jon shared a real way to create the story. Loved the  examples.  Thanks Jon. Also thanks for the warnings. Very much appreciated.
wow! Such an amazing course with helpful tips.Thanks for giving us this valuable content.

Taking this course felt like getting a hug from my girlfriend after a really stressful day.  it was simple and straightforward, made me feel like I could really get good at this and make money along the way. I can't wait to see how good I get at creating copy that sells.
Informative, useful, fun.
Great advice from a successful writer.
Great simple and concrete strategies to create interesting content that will work.
I was engaged and waiting for the next word to be spoken. The concepts were memorizing. I know that you will be able to write anything simply to impact your readers. You must watch to understand.

This court was an eye-opening experience on how to create a great story. No matter what field you are in the ability to tell a great story is so relevant, and you can't leave this course and not become a better storyteller.
When you take this course, you will walk away with a skill set to tell your story and drive sales!
I can't wait to put the ideas in this gem of a course into practice.
This course provides a ton of great material not found in other courses at the same price.
Really like his teaching style and the actionable content. Enjoyed it!
So well crafted and easy to follow. I am definitely signing up for his other course!
Very informative lesson. I learned more in these few videos than I expected. You get taught what skills you need and how to develop them.

So much insights, wow! Thanks a lot and pls keep going!

Laura
This course contained excellent and useful information that I guarantee you will use.
Great one Jon, A lot of value delivered!
So many golden nuggets - thank you!
John killed it!!!
Excellent course!
Very good course!
Another good course from a individual that creates very understandable and actionable pieces of information.  I appreciate the formulas he uses to make the information more understandable.
Very fun and concise!

I have taken many online courses and have had encountered with many writers but no one was as smart, crisp and precise as Jon. One of the best course I ever had. Totally worth it!! I'm glad I took his course.
Fantastic content - condensed into short segments.  Each topic gave great value.
Excellent course very detailed.  I wish I had a teacher like Jon when going through my education.   Uses very powerful teaching methods that will last a lifetime.
Great course, gives you lots of different angles for ideas
Great course about writing effective stories and articles about anything! Simple to understand and awesome examples and descriptions. Would definitely recommend!
Outstanding course!  Instructor speaks clearly, slowly throughout making it easy to learn the material!
This course provided useful advice in the subjects of marketing and nonfiction writing.
This course help spark my imagination to write better. Great work!
Simply the best ever!!!!
Great course – whether you are a seasoned pro, or just starting out!
EXCELLENT COURSE!! WORLD CLASS

Fantastic course for ANY content creator. 

A Master Chef is only as good as his ability to source and combine the ingredients. With this course you'll learn how to create a delicious 7 course skillset using all of the ingredients at your disposal.

^^ That's the power of the metaphor ;)

Jon delivered the best and his way of teaching is great as he elaborated big information in just a short span of time which is amazing
Thanks Jon and Fiverr!

This course is like watching a Netflix series, you can watch it at nights, and it's entertaining.

It was difficult for me to understand better some ideas before watching it, and it only took me about $30 to do that.

If you want to improve your writing skills, you should buy this course.
I've been using some of the techniques subconsciously so far what gives me great feedback to see in the course. :)

This course is exceptional. I take a lot of online courses. Out of the six I've done this year, I'd recommend this one the most. Absolutely every minute of video provides you with excellent value; Jonathon does not waste your time with fluff but explains things simply in a straightforward way. Even as a seasoned freelance writer I've learned new things and been reminded of the importance of other aspects of writing. I'd recommend this for a beginner or an experienced writer.
Great course, loved the content.
Jon’s writing course is worth the time it takes to watch it. If you plan on writing even a birthday card in the next year, get this course.
Great course!

The only writing Sherpa you need to freelance your way to wealth!!

The journey you are about to embark on is much like those of the early explorers. Yet today you will have the choice to repeat the mistakes of the past or to choose to follow the wisdom of a Sherpa. The value of a Sherpa is they has completed the journey many times before you. 

Jon Youshael does an amazing job breaking down your writing Everest. The wisdom Jon shares in this course will prepare you to complete your ascent up the mountain.

Once you complete this course I recommend going through one last time. The information is so informative that the only way you don't reach the top... is if you choose to go rouge on the journey, and disregard your Sherpa's advice.

I went through all the course suggestions here on Fiverr learn and this appeared to be the most relevant for me. I bought it and decided to listen to the first lesson. I have been exploring the idea of becoming a freelance writer on Fiverr, but I haven't really had a good idea of how to approach it. I felt like I had good ideas, but I didn't have an authentic and actionable plan to make those ideas become real. As I set up my Fiverr profile, I came across the "Learn from Fiverr" section and the course package on how to become a successful blogger on Fiverr. This was the bridge that I needed to get me from the side of having ideas in my head to walking towards making those ideas valuable. I'm so happy I took this course and I can't wait to put what I've learned into practice in developing my portfolio and hopefully soon landing my own clients on Fiverr.
Short

GREAT, TRULY INFORMATIVE
I LEARNED so much about writing and how to become a more effective writer. this course is truly a steal for the value of information presented versus the nominal cost.
Clear, concise, and creative perfection.

I took around ten masterclasses this year so far and this is one of the best and most useful of all. While I'm a freelancer in various fields for the last seven-year or so, TRS at Fiverr with over 2800 5-star ratings, Jon's lessons still were able to provide valuable lessons and tips that I can use to give more to my clients and also can help in my projects. Jon is an excellent presenter who does a great job of teaching value memorably. Highly recommended!

I've learnt so much in the course of 1 hour than I have at school about the skills of being a great writer. Also, what it takes to be able to sell my work. This course was so informative and engaging. Thanks a bunch.

Fun, light and engaging. These 7 secrets reveal top industry 'hacks' to build your content or copy as effectively as possible. I loved this course! It has pleasant background music, an excited and enthusiastic instructor and, best of all, leading tips and tricks from a pro. I can't wait to apply all that I've learned in this must-have course.

Extremely valuable and easy actionable steps for writing better content and supporting the growth of my clients. For a newbie on Fiverr, his bonus on how to support clients has sliced my learning curve and changed my perspective. I also have a lot of content ideas swirling around my head including metaphors and look forward to adding new content to my blog and for future publications. Was spending 1h30mins worth it. Yes, time well spent for sure. Thanks for all the tools you provided as well.

Great content - but he flies through the material too fast to even take notes. The quiz after each section really highlights the importance of reinforcing 'main points' - but without a downloadable handout for each section - the viewer is left without the most valuable content. Doing the quiz at the end using the handouts as references would probably improve integration and support true learning. I found myself wishing I took a photo of every screen shot. To make it worse - there was no way to 'go back' to review or reinforce messages delivered on this roller coaster ride. It became a race to keep up instead of a thought provoking opportunity to properly digest the 10 course meal offered.
ik ben net begonnen, maar tot nu toe vind ik het een super cursus

I decided to take this course, Stories That Sell: 7 Secrets To Create Killer Content, after reading an email I received from Fiverr. 

I thought what I really need in my life is the ability to tell deeper, richer stories because I am as exciting as a rock. I wanted to be as exciting as The Rock, Dwayne Johnson. So here began my mission to become a very muscular action hero with exceptional control of one eyebrow.

Now Jon Youshaei could not directly help me accomplish my mission. Not with this course at least. He did give me the confidence to get out there and act like Sherlock Holmes. 

What I learned is that if I want to become as exciting as The Rock, I need to get out there and learn by doing, pay attention to the details, and enter the back to the seventh-grade time machine. I needed to pretend that I AM The Rock in order to blossom.

Take this course and you too will blossom.

This course covers the same information I learned from the previous course (From Structure to Style, Master Your Copywriting), and even then, it does it in a less professional and knowledgeable way. The first skill taught in the first lesson is copy-pasting your text into the Hemingway App website to have it scan and decide what you should edit for you. That is not a writing skill, that is using an automated tool for what I took this course to learn. It feels like a cheap knock-off of the professional course I took before it. The instructor sounds like they're reading directly from a teleprompter, with no practice, and doesn't know what they're about to say before they read it. It's unpolished, and they even interrupted themselves in the first lesson that got left in from what should have been edited out—in my opinion. I am not interested in continuing this course but I do want to complete it for the badge, and because I already paid for the bundle that included it. So I simply completed the quizzes to get it over with and it was easy to guess my way through with the knowledge I already had from before taking the course.
The instructor is extremely engaging and relatable. He offered a lot of practical information and examples. I am really glad I took this course!!!
